column2: Interest in the island of New Guinea by the British settlers in Australia began by the mid-nineteenth century. British traders established a port and settlement at Port Moresby in 1875. The Colony of Queensland subsequently issued an unrecognized annexation proclamation. One of the early acts of the newly formed federation of Australia was to pass legislation transferring the southern parts of New Guinea to direct Australian Rule. Port Moresby became the administrative capital.

Camillo Paolo Filippo Giulio Benso, Count of Cavour, Prime Minister of The Kingdom of Sardinia, was a leading figure in the movement for Italian Unification, and his personal efforts at diplomacy are often credited with securing the support of Napoleon III's France against Austria in the Second Italian War of Independence.
column3: Camillo Paolo Filippo Giulio Benso, comte de Cavour, premier ministre du Royaume de Sardaigne, fut une figure marquante du mouvement pour une Italie unifiée. Il joua un rôle diplomatique déterminant dans le soutien de la France de Napoléon III contre l'Autriche lors de la seconde guerre d'indépendance italienne.
column4: Camillo Paolo Filippo Giulio Benso, Graf von Cavour, Premierminister des Königreichs Sardinien, war ein führender Kopf der italienischen Vereinigungsbewegung. Hinsichtlich seiner persönlichen diplomatischen Errungenschaften wird oft erwähnt, dass er Italien im zweiten italienischen Unabhängigkeitskrieg gegen Österreich die Unterstützung von Frankreich unter Napoleon III. sicherte.
column6: Camillo Benso, Conde de Cavour, primer ministro del reino de Cerdeña fue una figura destacada del movimiento por la unificación de Italia, y a sus esfuerzos personales en diplomacia se le suelen atribuir el haber conseguido el apoyo de la Francia de Napoleón III contra Austria en la Segunda Guerra de Independencia Italiana.

This decision will trigger a war using the Levy Taxes casus belli against our Indian puppet and instantly occupy all of their land in order to force them to surrender. The Levy Taxes casus belli adds war reparations and forces the target nation to become our puppet again.
This decision will give India ¤50,000 from you. §GReccomended to do this while India is at war so it can buy goods if it has no money!§!
Further Political Integration In Northern Germany

Prussia is destined to dominate and unify Germany. Our influence over the principalites and duchies of northern Germany have entrenched itself to such a degree that we may force political integration," if we disregard the international outrage...                             Note: Will integrate a random North German Sphereling that has been Sphered for 10 years costs 5 infamy and have a 1 year cooldown. §GDO NOT use this decision unless you have had a North German spherling for at least 10 years
This decision adds a modifier that displays your current Slavery Pressure value.

The Khedive of Egypt, Isma'il I commissioned an expedition to explore the Equatoria region south of the Sudan, and to organize a new Egyptian province there. A British explorer and engineer named Samuel White Baker who had led an expedition down the Nile in 1865 was contracted by the Khedive to lead the Egyptian forces and to be the first Governor-General of the new territory..
An expansionist Khedive, Isma'il I moved to incorporate the territory of Darfur into the Egyptian Sudan in 1874.
Our regional rivals are promoting pan-Italian nationalism in an attempt to legitimize the conquest of their neighbors! We must form a counter bloc to stop their clearly expansionist policy.
The Italian peninsula has been united! No longer will pretender elements exist within Italy.
We have crushed our pathetic rival's attempt at unifying the Italian peninsula under their guise of nationalism. Now we must unite the Italian peninsula under OUR guise of nationalism!

The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper, but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia, and Austria.

The Adriatic Sea, a region that is historically Italian, is within our grasp and many Italians live in the lands around it to this day. It's time to assert our hegemony on the territory around it, safeguarding the Italians that still live there.
If Australia is AI for the first year of the game, you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.
If South Africa is AI for the first year of the game, you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.
If Canada is AI for the first year of the game, you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.
This decision clears all of your current national promotion bonuses, allowing you to choose different options for the bonuses you do have unlocked.
The time has come for the Romanian peoples to accept the crown of Hungary.
After taking over Western Aragonese Maghreb, and annexing the local natives we have gained total dominion over North-West Africa.

Mesopotamia: the onetime home of Babylonia, Akkadia and Assyria holds great promise for archaeological discovery. We've moved beyond the old methods of tomb-raiding and amateur excavations--- we should outfit a modern expedition and seek permission to explore these lands. We might bring back a few trophies for the museum... and learn something along the way.
We must plunder the secrets of the ancient Minoan civilization, for the good of science.
The Bohemians are beaten back & much of Northern Germany is ours, it is time to look ever farther south to expand the Union.
Fire all minority bureaucrats and demote them to farmers and labourers, however this may affect our administrative effiency short-term.

The Báb, leader of the Babist movement has for some time been in our possession. Due to recent unrest among the followers of Babism, powerful figures in our court wish to execute him. This will hopefully restore unity to the empire, but might cause short term turmoil.

Ever since Gibraltar was lost to the British, Spain has made numerous attempts to regain it. With new nationalist sentiments sweeping the world, and Spains superior position as a great power, perhaps it is once again time to make it clear that Gibraltar is vital for Spanish territorial integrity, and its sovereignty should reflect this fact!

Near the mouth of the Paraguay river, there is a sharp bend. A strategic site without equal in the region, building a fortress here would allow us to control all passage in and out of our country, and even Mato Grosso. We will build a fortress the likes of which have never been seen in South America, and one day it will be known as the Gibraltar of South America.
Clicking this decision will fire an event allowing you to set a cap of how many %'s of bureaucrats you want per state maximum.
Trigger an event for each vassal which then triggers an event from them to us in which we can decide to free them or not.
